name: The Competition in Sittacene and the Placating of Sisigambis
maker: Master of the Jardin de vertueuse consolation and assistant
description: The Competition in Sittacene and the Placating of Sisigambis; Master of the Jardin de vertueuse consolation and assistant (Flemish, active 3rd quarter of 15th century); Bruges (illuminated), Belgium; about 1470 - 1475; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 43.2 x 33 cm (17 x 13 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 8, fol. 99; J.
